meanings: 기분·걱정 I'm satisfied with the result.
기분·걱정 It turned out pretty well.
직장에서의 표현 That certainly sounds reasonable.
신발 가게에서 He's wearing about a seven-and-a-half now.
영화 About how long is that movie?

vlive.korean: 아 그 정도로... Oh, that much... 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
그 정도까진 아닌가? - 밥도 그래? Is it not that bad? - For rice too? 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
vlive.english: Is it not that bad? - For rice too?

vlive.korean: 여기를 베고 자면 - 거북목도 교정되고 - 그 정도로? If you put your head here... - It can fix your turtle neck. - To that extent? 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: If you put your head here... - It can fix your turtle neck. - To that extent?

vlive.korean: 진짜 그 정도예요? Really? That much? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 차은우의 Just one 10 minutes
그 정도는 있다고요? Oh, this is nothing compared to what you have? 듣기 View video NCT : 안녕하세요 시즈니!! 제노에요진짜 잠깐 하려고 하는데.. 제노가 보고싶으면 들어오세요!! 이제 시작합니다
vlive.english: Oh, this is nothing compared to what you have?

examples.korean: It’s about that long. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 길이가 그 정도 돼. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s about that long. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They’re not as rich as all that. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들이 그 정도로 부자는 아니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They’re not as rich as all that. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There are only so many hours in a day. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하루에 시간은 그 정도 밖에 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There are only so many hours in a day. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It wasn’t so good as last time. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 지난번만큼 그렇게[그 정도로] 좋지는 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It wasn’t so good as last time. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She’s not as rich as people make out. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 사람들이 말하는 그 정도의 부자가 아니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’s not as rich as people make out. Add to Wordbook
